content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace located at Position(5.0, 5.0)  
Use-case: Converts iron ore (with coal) into iron plates needed for downstream production.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace located at Position(-27.0, -60.0)  
Use-case: Processes copper ore (with coal) into copper plates to support copper cable production.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Call Signature Mismatch  
  – When calling get_entities, ensure the parameters exactly match the expected signature. Avoid using unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or supplying extra positional arguments.  
  
• Inventory Verification Prior to Placement  
  – Check that the required item (e.g. a lab) is available in the inventory before attempting its placement. Confirm that the target tile is valid and unoccupied.  
 
• Incomplete Crafting Resources  
  – Verify that all sub-ingredients needed for crafting complex items (such as labs, which depend on items like iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available or can be produced. Adjust resource processing (smelting or pre-crafting) accordingly.  
 
• Handling Null or Unexpected Return Values  
  – Validate that functions like get_entities return a proper iterable. If the function might return None, implement a fallback (such as using an empty list) before iterating over the result.
